meta.title: Authorized Channels | Aquadecor USA & Global Partners
meta.description: Ensure your Aquadecor products are authentic and US-Customs compliant. View our authorized global distribution network and official inquiry channels.

hero.title: Authorized Channels
hero.subtitle: To ensure safe transit and tariff compliance for the US market, please use only official partners or contact

scam.title: Urgent: US Tariff Scams
scam.description: Third parties claiming to offer 'tariff-free' Aquadecor products for the US market are fraudulent. Scammers are posing as agents to collect unauthorized payments. Only use the channels listed on this page.

official.description: Genuine Aquadecor setups for US customers are exclusively managed through
